summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 2019 discussing efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails show coordination between FBI agents in New York and Boston regarding a potential sighting of Maxwell in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: FBI agent in New York's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) who is coordinating efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual the FBI is attempting to locate, with a potential sighting reported in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts.

connections.description: Sean, an FBI agent, is actively working to locate and investigate Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Initial report on Maxwell's potential location
events.description: An FBI agent in Boston (BS) receives and reports information from Manchester-by-the-Sea regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's potential presence there.

events.title: FBI coordination to locate Maxwell
events.description: FBI agents in New York and Boston coordinate via email to nail down Ghislaine Maxwell's location following a potential sighting report.

keyFacts: In August 2019, the FBI was actively attempting to locate Ghislaine Maxwell.
A potential sighting of Maxwell was reported in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) in New York was involved in the investigation.
The email shows internal FBI coordination between New York and Boston field offices regarding Maxwell's location.
